description: Try our easy to follow Pepper Crusted Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Low sugar,Beef
name: Pepper Crusted Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle spice sachet onto a plate.
Remove burger patties from tray and brush each side lightly with some oil. Press lightly onto spice mix to coat. Set aside for 15 minutes.
Preheat barbecue grill and hotplate on mediumhigh.
Slice onions into rings and toss with remaining oil. Cook onions on hotplate, turning frequently until golden.
Cook burger patties on grill for 4 minutes each side or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil to keep warm.
Split rolls and toast, if desired. Fill with lettuce, tomato, beef patty and cooked onion. Add a good dollop of beetroot dip and serve.
